dict.acceptation: （使）集中，（使）聚集；调整（镜头，眼睛）焦点[焦距]以便看清；
调整（眼睛或者镜头的）焦距；集中（光束于）；聚焦，注视；集中注意力；
焦点；影象的清晰度；（活动、注意力、兴趣等的）中心；[医]病灶，病症；

sent.orig: Examples of commercially available nonprocedural languages include Prolog, Focus, Lotus 1-2-3, and many others.
sent.trans: 商业上使用的非过程语言的例子有：Prolog,focus,Lotusl-2-3和其它等。

sent.orig: Inner Focus: Chastise now benefits from Inner Focus. In addition, Starshards no longer consumes Inner Focus.
sent.trans: 心灵专注：消耗心灵专注现在可以施放责罚。另外，星辰碎片不再消耗心灵专注。

sent.orig: The focus shall be programmatically exposed so that assistive technology can track focus and focus changes.
sent.trans: 游标焦点应可由程式读取，使科技辅助得以追踪焦点及其改变。

sent.orig: Focus (inherited from Control) Sets focus to the control. Attempts to set focus to this control.
sent.trans: 设置控件的焦点，不要告诉我知道！

sent.orig: Mental Agility, Inner Focus, Shadow Reach, Shadow Focus and Shadow Affinity now all affect Psychic Horror.
sent.trans: 精神敏锐，心灵专注，暗影延伸，暗影集中，暗影亲和现在都能对心灵恐慌起作用。
